name: Strandolio
description:
Stranded in the middle of a far-off sea, your society of little guys is at your mercy. You must keep them alive, fed, and most importantly: social. In Strandolio, loneliness is just as big a threat as starvation, but unfortunately not all of your villagers will be here to make friends...

- Interlocking systems!

- 21 unique cards, that turn into 21 unique little guys when you play them!

- Lots of different strategies! 

Uncover all of Strandolio's secrets and survive as long as you can!
